vulnerability_findings.name: calls-loop
vulnerability_findings.message:
airdrop.transfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool,string)(caddress.call(id,from,_tos[i],v),Transfer failed) (patch_1.sol#13)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in airdrop.transfer (patch_1.sol#4-16):
	-require(bool,string)(caddress.call(id,from,_tos[i],v),Transfer failed) patch_1.sol#13

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_tos' of airdrop.transfer (patch_1.sol#7) is not in mixedCase
